name: Creeping Fire
explanation: A fire starts spreading from the point you choose to two more squares. The fire spreads a sqaure after every creature's turn. For each red point after 1, the fire spreads 1 square faster every turn. For each green point after 1, the fire spreads 1 square more.

name: Accelerate
explanation: You get an extra action this round. if you attack with that action add 1d6 to a single attack. For each red point you spent after 2, add an extra 1d6.

name: Thorns of Haste
explanation: Choose a target within range. Thorny vines rush towards the target from beneath your feet, clearing any harsh terrain along the way, and emerging beneath the target. The target makes a dexterity saving throw and takes 2d8 pierce damage and gets entangled on a fail. Half as much damage on a success.
